name: TRAGO
description: TRAGO tells the story of Juca, a regular guy that goes everyday at the same hour to this low budget bar called Trago.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: 128MB Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB
